summary: This module implements a hierarchy of host‑profile classes used by the Ansible testing framework. It models generic hosts, controller/origin hosts, Docker‑based containers, POSIX/SSH remote hosts, Windows hosts and inventory entries, providing methods for setup, provisioning, readiness checks, deprovisioning and connection handling, as well as utilities for inventory serialization and cgroup validation.
business_intent: To provide a unified, extensible abstraction for defining, configuring and managing the lifecycle of diverse test target hosts—local, containerized, or remote—so that the Ansible test suite can interact with them consistently during execution.
